definition: position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: Suddenly I realized that the sixth and seventh spaces were the solution to the problem.
sentences.chinese: 突然，我意識到第六和第七個空位就是這道題的答案。

sentences.english: Please use additional sheet on Part B4 if required.
sentences.chinese: 如表格空位不夠，請加B4段表格填寫。

sentences.english: The train got more jam-packed and soon all of the seats were occupied.
sentences.chinese: 火車裏越來越擠，很快就沒有空位了。

sentences.english: But the vacancy may have different levels as its notability is quite different.
sentences.chinese: 但“空位”因它的顯性程度不同而出現層次不同。

sentences.english: We HAD to squash up to make room for the others who wanted to use the lift.
sentences.chinese: 我們得擠出空位讓其他想搭電梯的人進來。

sentences.english: Anyway, we HAs seats to new bookings on the flight. No problem.
sentences.chinese: 別擔心，這班班機仍有空位給予新的訂位者。

sentences.english: Small pieces of durable cargo can be used as filler cargo to fill in the interstice and void space.
sentences.chinese: 小件耐久貨物可用作填隙貨物來填充小縫和空位。

sentences.english: Please specify reasons for applying late payment of tuition fee in next page.
sentences.chinese: 請於下頁空位內填上閣下申請延期繳交學費的原因。

sentences.english: so they don’t take inv space. but apparently you an only hold 10 you’re not using.
sentences.chinese: 他們不佔據背囊空位，但你只能攜帶10個備選。

sentences.english: Anyway, we have seats for new bookings on this flight. No problem.
sentences.chinese: 別擔心，這班班機仍有空位新的訂位者。

sentences.english: Anyway, we get seats to new bookings on that flight. No problem.
sentences.chinese: 別擔心，這班班機仍有空位給予新的訂位者。

sentences.english: Anyway we have seats for new bookings on this flight. No problem.
sentences.chinese: 別擔墟片這班班機仍有空位提供新荒訂位者。

sentences.english: If there are too many product items and the space provided in the form is insufficient, please attach separate sheets.
sentences.chinese: 如產品項目衆多，而表格內空位足，請另附紙張填寫。

sentences.english: There was an old man beside one empty place, and Mr.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個空位旁坐着一位老人。

sentences.english: Anyway, we get seats to new bookings on that flight.
sentences.chinese: 別擔心，這班班機仍有空位給予新的訂位者。

sentences.english: Would you like to sit in smoking, non-smoking or whatever comes open first?
sentences.chinese: 你們要抽菸區還是無煙區，或是有空位就行？

definition: to receive a served ball (volleyball, tennis etc)/to catch a ball thrown by sb
(military) line of troops encircling an enemy position/(telephony) outside line/(basketball) outside the three-point line
to hit the target with one's throw/(basketball) to score
